title: Negative Societal Attitudes and Discrimination
description: Individuals with OUD often face harsh judgment and unfair treatment due to societal misconceptions. These negative attitudes can lead to:

list.title: Social Isolation
list.description: People with OUD may be shunned by their communities, leading to loneliness and reduced social support.

list.title: Employment Discrimination
list.description: Many individuals face difficulties securing or maintaining employment due to their history of substance use.

list.title: Healthcare Bias
list.description: Prejudice in healthcare settings can result in substandard care, as healthcare professionals might treat patients with OUD differently.

summary: By addressing these issues, we can create a more supportive environment that encourages individuals to seek the help they need without fear of judgment.
